pages.text: $(li)The Illager Tower is where the $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_illager_king)$(/l) lives.$(br)$(li)You should investigate every floor, who knows, maybe you can find interesting $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) there.$(br)$(li)Be careful, the $(l:patchouli:illagers/archer)Archers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/furantur)Furanturs$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:illagers/enchanter)Enchanters$(/l) will be prepared to defend their King from intruders.

$(li)The Illager Tower can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savanna$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamp$(/l) biomes.
